shortdesc.ph: Gets the playback progress of the music file.
Gets the playback progress of the music file.
Gets the playback progress of the music file.
Gets the playback progress of the music file.

section.p: This method gets the current playback progress of the music file in milliseconds.
This method gets the current playback progress of the music file, in milliseconds.
This method gets the current playback progress of the music file, in milliseconds.
This method gets the current playback progress of the music file, in milliseconds.

ul.li: You must call this method after calling and receiving the onAudioMixingStateChanged(AudioMixingStatePlaying) callback.
If you need to call multiple times, make sure the interval between calls is greater than 500 ms.
You need to call this method after calling and receiving the onAudioMixingStateChanged(AudioMixingStatePlaying) callback.
If you need to call multiple times, make sure the interval between calls is greater than 500 ms.
You need to call this method after calling and receiving the onAudioMixingStateChanged(audioMixingStatePlaying) callback.
If you need to call multiple times, ensure the interval between calls is greater than 500 ms.
You need to call this method after calling and receiving the OnAudioMixingStateChanged(AUDIO_MIXING_STATE_PLAYING) callback.
If you need to call multiple times, make sure the interval between calls is greater than 500 ms.
≥ 0: Success. Returns the current playback position of the music file (ms). 0 indicates the music file has not started playing.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
≥ 0: Success. Returns the current playback position of the music file (ms). 0 means the music file has not started playing.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
≥ 0: The method call succeeds and returns the current playback progress of the music file (ms). 0 indicates the music file has not started playing.
< 0: The method call fails. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
≥ 0: Success. Returns the current playback progress of the music file (ms). 0 indicates the music file has not started playing.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
